nodes.text: A male individual served until 3650 BBY as Director of the Strategic Information Service, the Galactic Republic's intelligence service during the Great Galactic War and Cold War with the Sith Empire. He retired due to ailing health and chose Marcus Trant as his successor.
The director was first mentioned in an entry for Marcus Trant in Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia which was published by Dorling Kindersley on October 15, 2012.
